name: Adult Sexual Solicitation & Sexually Explicit Language
description: Restricts content facilitating sexual encounters, commercial sexual services, pornography requests/offers, and sexually explicit language. Protects against trafficking, coercion, and non-consensual acts.
corePrinciple: We allow discussion of sex worker rights and sex work regulation, but draw the line when content facilitates sexual encounters or commercial sexual services between adults, or when content asks for or offers pornographic/sexual content.
